summary: Latest survey reveals just 8% of organizations qualify as highly mature in the cloud.  Our results describe what sets them apart and the big benefits that follow
title: HashiCorp State of Cloud Strategy Survey 2024: Cloud maturity is elusive but valuable

summary: Discover the inspiring journey of Marie Bergman as she left Family Four to follow her own path, emphasizing the importance of going your own way in life
title: Go your own way

summary: A group of cryptographers have analyzed the eiDAS 2. 0 regulation (electronic identification and trust services) that defines the new EU Digital Identity Wallet.
title: Security Analysis of the EU’s Digital Wallet

summary: My first memory of television is from July of 1969 - Neil Armstrong, Apollo 11 and the moon landing.  I remember the adults in the house being awed and excited but not much more beyond that.  Most of my early TV memories are of stuff the grownups watched, not kid
title: Me and the Box

summary:
This chapter might be one of the most feature-packed yet, bringing the highly requested timer feature and major improvements to wake words, along with experimental technology that even outclasses big tech’s voice assistants. 

Welcome to Voice Chapter 7, on today’s menu:

Big things for microWakeWord
Timers are here. 
Timers control devices
AI in control
Expand an LLM with scripts
Enhanced Media Control
Easier updates for your voice assistant


Big things for microWakeWord
At the beginning of this year wake word detection could only run on Home Assistant itself...
title: Voice Chapter 7 - Supercharged wake words and timers

summary:
